description: {"blocks":[{"key":"2187i","text":"Phosphate-buffered saline (PBS) is an isotonic solution that is used in many biological research applications.PBS (phosphate buffered saline) is a balanced salt solution used for a variety of cell culture applications, such as washing cells before dissociation, transporting cells or tissue, diluting cells for counting, and preparing reagents. PBS is formulated without calcium and magnesium for rinsing chelators from the culture before cell dissociation.","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

status.info: We use this protocol and it’s working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"4kqnl","text":"Perform a 1:10 dilution of 10x PBS using a sterile media bottle of 1L volume or greater (if necessary).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"68oa9","text":"Place cap directly on top of sterile media bottle (DO NOT tighten cap).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"53upv","text":"Autoclave sterile media with 1x PBS: Liquid cycle: media ( ).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":58,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"rqfn","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":1800,"guid":"3E1E2770E35D11ECA81DEF1C86FE296D","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6uvvo","text":"Retrieve autoclaved 1x PBS \u0026 fully cap sterile media bottle for storage.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2kbte","text":"Combine   DI H2O and   10x PBS into sterile media bottle.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":8,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":21,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"cqqmq","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"450","error":false,"guid":"4F421FC0E35D11ECA81DEF1C86FE296D","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}},"1":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"50","error":false,"guid":"5173A5C0E35D11ECA81DEF1C86FE296D","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}}}}

title: Media Prep: 500mL of 1x PBS
